alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 30 at 3:59AM EDT until April 30 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds near 25 mph with frequent gusts of 35 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Florida Keys. * WHEN...Until 5 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...A Wind Advisory means that sustained winds of 30 to 39 mph, or frequent gusts in excess of 35 mph are expected. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Wind gusts along the Overseas Highway will be highest on bridges and overpasses.
info.instruction: Motorists should be alert for sudden gusts of wind, especially on bridges, which may cause you to lose control of your vehicle. Use extra caution. Residents should secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys
